success.registered: Registration successful. Please check your email for a verification code.
success.passwordResetEmailSent: If this account exists, a password reset code has been sent.
success.resetCodeVerified: Reset code verified. You may now set a new password.
success.twoFactorSetupInitiated: Two-factor authentication setup initiated. Scan the QR code to continue.

errors.emailAlreadyExists: An account with this email address already exists.
errors.defaultRoleNotFound: Default user role not found. Please contact support.
errors.accountInactive: Your account is inactive. Please contact support.
errors.emailNotVerified: Please verify your email address before logging in.
errors.emailAlreadyVerified: This email address has already been verified.
errors.verificationCodeExpired: This verification code has expired. Please request a new one.
errors.verificationLinkExpired: This verification link has expired. Please request a new one.
errors.verificationRateLimitExceeded: Too many verification attempts. Please wait {minutes} minutes before trying again.
errors.invalidCodeWithAttemptsRemaining: Invalid verification code. {remaining} attempts remaining today.
errors.invalidCodeFinalWarning: Invalid verification code. Only {remaining} attempts remaining â€” request a new code soon.
errors.dailyVerifyAttemptsExceeded: Maximum of {max} verification attempts reached for today. Please try again after {resetsAt}.
errors.invalidOrExpiredLink: This link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one.
errors.missingTokenOrCode: A token and code are both required.
errors.resetCodeExpired: This password reset code has expired. Please request a new one.
errors.resetLinkExpired: This password reset link has expired. Please request a new one.
errors.resetTokenInvalidated: This password reset token is no longer valid. Please request a new reset.
errors.tooManyLoginAttempts: Too many failed login attempts. Please try again in 15 minutes.
errors.tooManyEmailRequestsFromIp: Too many email requests from your location. Please try again later.
errors.tooManyPasswordResetRequestsFromIp: Too many password reset requests from your location. Please try again later.
errors.dailyEmailLimitReached: You have reached the daily email send limit. Please try again tomorrow.
errors.resendLimitExceeded: Too many resend attempts. Please try again later.
errors.resendTooSoon: Please wait {time} before requesting another code. {attemptsRemaining} attempts remaining today.
errors.passwordResetTooSoon: Please wait {time} before requesting another reset code. {attemptsRemaining} attempts remaining today.
errors.dailyMaxAttemptsReached: Maximum of {max} attempts reached for today. Please try again tomorrow.
errors.dailyPasswordResetLimitReached: Maximum of {max} password reset attempts reached for today. Please try again tomorrow.
errors.twoFactorAlreadyEnabled: Two-factor authentication is already enabled on this account.
errors.twoFactorNotEnabled: Two-factor authentication is not enabled on this account.
errors.twoFactorSetupRequired: Please complete two-factor authentication setup before enabling it.
errors.twoFactorLockedOut: Too many failed two-factor attempts. Please try again in 15 minutes.
